title: Sugar beet production in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in thousand tons, with a total of 20 data points. The chart has 8 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2006 to 2003.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2003 to 2000.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2014 to 2012.
But, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2012 to 2010.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2010 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: This statistic shows the total U.S. sugar beet production from 2000 to 2019 . According to the report , approximately 28.6 million tons of sugar beet were produced in the United States in 2019 .
